div.head: (C.4 d.init.)
div.ab: Quidam in excomunicatione c̄ſtitutꝰ ep̄m accuſare diſponit; adoleſcentē Ī xiiiiū ętatiſ ſue annū ad aſſertionē ſuę cauſę adducit. Ꝓhibitus ab accuſatione adoleſcētē accuſatorē, ⁊ se teſtē facit. Adoleſcenſ ꝑersonā accuſatoriſ ⁊ teſtiſ gerere cupit; di ſtatuta ad iudiciū electoꝝ iudiciū ep̄s minime c̄currit, a cōiōe ſuſpender̄; tandē renouato iudicio, accusatoꝛ culpabił in accuſatiōe inuenitur, demū ad aſſertionē ꝓͥe cauſe ꝓcedit. Hic pͥmū querit[ur] an in excōic̄atione c̄ſtitutꝰ, aliū accuſare ualeat.
